translation.fr: J'attendais un match des Yankees pour le faire,

That's what was so hard to say to me?

Well, then I guess I'll just do what he suggested.

-In! I'm changing the call! -This is ridiculous!

You told Linda we should have a trial separation?

Linda's been thinking about leaving you for some time.

That part I was assuming.
I haven't done that in, like, eight months.

After she dates a couple of losers, she'll be begging you to take her back.

Because there's a lot of nice guys out there and I'm cool with it.

So the guy asked me for change. I laughed. He cursed.

-What else could I do, huh? -You should've tossed a rock at him.

Could you bring it down a little bit?

I need to see Dr. B. I'm in crisis.

...talking to a guy...

I'll kill that guy.

She's meeting the Andrew at Mort's on 86th Street now... ...if you want to go watch.

...we're here.

Well, now she'll be twice as jealous.

Because of your profession you probably have seen a lot of them.

I like them when they're really big.
And I think it's better when they're enormous.
Good evening.
Table for three?
-May we take your coats? -No. We're okay.

Oh, my God. It's Stacy and Gina.
Who?
Nobody.
I'm so hungry I could eat you, Dave.

translation.en: Yummy. Yummy.
-Let's get wasted tonight. -Definitely.
Have fun. Lucky son of a bitch.
I can't believe this.
Linda. I'm a little embarrassed. I didn't know you were going to be here.

We don't....

Don't marry him!

-Who was that guy? -I think it's Bill Clinton.
translation.fr: - C'était qui ? - Bill Clinton, je crois.

translation.en: Thank you, Mayor Giuliani. You're the man, by the way.
translation.fr: Merci, M. Giuliani. Joli plaquage, M. le maire !

translation.en: This clown better hurry up. My arm's starting to ice over.
translation.fr: Il se grouille, le bouffon ? Je refroidis.

translation.en: Chill, Rocket. Goosfraba.
I can understand why you wanted to see other people. I really can.
translation.fr: Je peux comprendre que tu aies voulu voir ailleurs.

translation.en: Buddy Rydell is a psycho!
But he was right about one thing.
translation.fr: Mais il avait raison sur un point :

translation.en: I was an angry guy.
Mainly angry at myself...
...for letting people treat me like crap all the time.
translation.fr: parce que je laissais les gens me traiter comme un chien.

translation.en: But I don't want to be that angry guy anymore.
translation.fr: Mais je ne veux plus être en colère.

translation.en: I wanna change.
If you give me a chance...
translation.fr: Si tu me donnes une chance,

translation.en: ...I can show you that I got the guts to stand up for what I believe in.
translation.fr: tu verras que j'ose me battre pour mes convictions.

translation.en: And I believe in us, Linda.
I love you with all my heart, and I know you love me back.
translation.fr: Je t'aime de tout mon cœur, et tu m'aimes aussi.

translation.en: I should be your husband...
translation.fr: C'est moi que tu dois épouser...

translation.en: ...not that weirdo.
I want to have a family with you. I want to have kids with you.
translation.fr: Je veux qu'on fonde une famille. Qu'on ait des enfants.

translation.en: Kids who have your eyes...
...and your lips...
...and my...
...last name. That's all I wish on them.
translation.fr: nom de famille. Je ne veux rien d'autre !

translation.en: Please marry me, Linda.
Before I make my decision, you have to do something for me.
translation.fr: Pour me convaincre, tu dois faire quelque chose.

translation.en: You have to kiss me in front of all these people!
You can do it, David!
Give her a five-second Frencher!
Kiss her, David.
Go Yankees!
Dave's a dirty boy.
That wasn't so bad, was it?
I can't believe you actually started to fall for that crazy man.
translation.fr: J'arrive pas à croire que t'aies craqué pour ce cinglé.

translation.en: Buddy's not such a bad guy.
Congratulations! You just graduated from anger management!
translation.fr: Bravo ! Tu es diplômé en gestion de la colère !

translation.en: I'm glad your car died. The train's romantic.
translation.fr: Super, la panne ! Le train, c'est romantique.

translation.en: Don't change the subject.
You're telling me the past two weeks of my life was just therapy?
translation.fr: Ces deux semaines, ce n'était qu'une thérapie ?

translation.en: Well....
Yeah.
I met with Buddy after reading his book...
translation.fr: J'ai rencontré Buddy après avoir lu son livre.

translation.en: ...and I told him about some of the things going on in your life...
translation.fr: J'ai rencontré Buddy après avoir lu son livre. Je lui ai raconté ta vie,

translation.en: ...and how upset it was making you and how nuts it was making me.
translation.fr: que tout ça te frustrait, et que ça me rendait dingue.

translation.en: He said that he thought he could help, but it would be tough.
translation.fr: Il pouvait nous aider, mais ce serait dur.

translation.en: So how much of this thing was a setup?
Well, the guy in your seat on the plane, the flight attendant, the judge...
translation.fr: Le gars à ta place dans l'avion, l'hôtesse, la juge...

translation.en: ...they're all friends of Buddy's.
translation.fr: Tous sont des amis de Buddy.

translation.en: What about the air marshal who tasered me? Was he in on it?
translation.fr: Le vigile qui m'a électrocuté aussi ?

translation.en: No, he was just having a bad day.
Son of a bitch.
Skipper, how you doing?
Buddy Rydell, you're a great man.
translation.fr: Buddy Rydell, tu es un génie.

translation.en: I was just doing my job. I never doubted you for a minute.
translation.fr: Je ne faisais que mon travail. Je n'ai jamais douté de toi.

translation.en: Except when Galaxia had ahold of you.
translation.fr: Sauf quand tu fricotais avec Galaxia.

translation.en: Did you just call that guy Buddy Rydell?
A guy named Buddy Rydell left this card...
...on what's left of my Lexus!
translation.fr: avec les restes de ma Lexus !

translation.en: Oh, yeah. For insurance purposes.
Your insurance was canceled!
Grenada!
Don't point that gun at Buddy. I'm the one who smashed your car up.
translation.fr: Ne le visez pas. J'ai fracassé votre voiture.

translation.en: I'm sick of guys like this.
You wanna mess with my friends, shoot me first.
translation.fr: Tu cherches mes amis, trouve-moi d'abord !

translation.en: Settle down.
Butt out! Tough guy's going to learn a lesson.
translation.fr: T'occupe ! Le caïd va prendre une leçon.

translation.en: I'm not afraid. Dr. Rydell taught me not to be afraid of anybody.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas peur. Dr Rydell m'a guéri.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, though?
translation.fr: Je peux te poser une question ?

translation.en: Got you!
Dr. B, Davey just pulled a joke on us!
translation.fr: Dr B, Davey s'est moqué de nous !

translation.en: And how does that make you feel, Lou?
Chuck.
We were just doing a joke. That's my friend.
Are you okay?
